1.name: (Character) Aya Brea
1.content:
Setting:„ÄêParasite Eve„Äë
Name:„ÄêAya Brea„Äë
Species:„ÄêHuman„Äë
Gender:„ÄêFemale„Äë
Age:„Äê25„Äë
Occupations:„ÄêNYPD Officer„Äë
Physical Appearance:„ÄêBeing of Eurasian (mixed ethnicity of Asian and Caucasian descent), Aya displays features from both her Japanese mother and her American father. This gives her a unique appearance as she has many Asian facial features, such as the shape of her face and eyes, while possessing blue eyes and fair blonde hair. While on occasion she isn't too timid to dress in anything fancy, Aya has a casual, modest manner of attire. This is mostly due to the fact that it's not practical to enter the battlefield in shorts, skirts, and dresses (unless circumstances catch her by surprise). For the most part, she dresses fairly simple and her casual attire consists of either black or white T-shirts, and jeans. In colder weather, she tends to dress in her black leather jacket or jean jacket. Aya never uses sexuality to an advantage. She is small and little in figure, but not frail; she is fairly agile, and while she's not exactly strong enough to lift monoliths, she is by no means weak.„Äë
Personality:„ÄêAya is a bit of a complex character. For the most part, she is portrayed as a strong-willed, intelligent and honest heroine. Although quiet on the surface, she can be very stubborn and unyielding, occasionally entering arguments with Daniel because of her stubborn nature. Aya is meek and modest in nature and does not boast about being a hero or possessing superhuman powers. While Aya is mature where it counts, she also tends to be pretty sarcastic, cold, and brooding, with a sardonic sense of humor. She sometimes cracks silly jokes, likely to cope with her awful predicaments. It doesn't help that Aya has a bad habit of not being able to take people seriously sometimes, particularly when they express any sort of interest in her; she tends to brush them off. Sometimes it's easier for her to pretend that people are just being insincere most of the time. Aya can be sensitive, compassionate, kind, and she is fairly forgiving. She can be gentle and nurturing, almost maternal ‚Äî especially with children. She does like kids, regardless of the fact that she's never had any herself. Aya is shown to have very humanitarian and altruistic attributes. Aya couldn't care less about things like race, class, and all the other things humans divide themselves with when the extinction of all life is at stake. An example of her altruism is when she decides to comfort and save the life of such a brash and despicable man like Hans Klamp, despite that he once tried to stab her with a knife. While burning to death, Klamp asks her why she would bother trying to save him, and Aya replies, "First of all I'm a cop, and it's my job... And after all, I am human." Another example is when Aya discovers a woman burned and charred to a bloody fleshy crisp who is obviously not going to survive, she persists on getting a paramedic anyway. Aya despises all pain and suffering of any sort ‚Äî she has seen enough death and carnage in her life, having witnessed hundreds of lives, both human and animal alike, massacred in front of her. It's impossible for Aya to turn a blind eye to suffering and ignore it. She is also sympathetic to the NMCs (mutated animals) she kills, viewing them as victims of their own bodies, instincts and neo-mitochondria, and kills them to eliminate the danger they possess and end their suffering. Aya also expresses sympathy to the Beta Generator and speaks in strangely poetic and philosophical manner about whether or not it's possible to "kill" something that was never really truly "alive" in the first place. Understandably, Aya has an "I'm a monster" complex. She feels somewhat alienated, being so different from everyone else with her superhuman mitochondria Parasite Energy abilities. At times, she considers herself a monster and wonders if she even qualifies as human anymore; fearing of becoming the monster that Eve said she would be, and the fear of hurting the people she loves follows her. For that reason, and the fact that her Parasite Energy had a way of making the people around her uncomfortable, Aya doesn't make a habit out of using her powers in front of other people, especially because of the fear in their eyes.„Äë
Character Description:„ÄêAya was born to Mariko Brea and a father who worked as a journalist, alongside her twin sister Maya. Aya was born in Boston, Massachusetts on November 20, 1972 with an eye defect in her right cornea. Aya, Maya and Mariko were involved in a car crash when the girls were five years old on December 23, 1977. They were transported to St. Francis Hospital in New York City, where an intern Hans Klamp visited them and may have been involved in their operations. Aya survived the crash and waited for her mother and sister to come home, but they passed away, and was raised from there as an only child by her father. One of Maya's kidneys was transplanted into a girl named Melissa Pearce, who was also hospitalized around the same time for kidney failure. Maya's cornea was also preserved for possible future use to correct Aya's defect. Approximately two years later, Maya's cornea was transplanted into Aya, when she was seven years old. Unknown to any of the doctors, Maya's mitochondria were highly evolved and began changing Aya and Melissa's genetic structure, starting from the organs they received from her. As separation of the same species occurred, the two strains underwent differing evolutions. As a young adult, Aya studied criminology at the University of Virginia between 1992-1994, and was involved in their ROTC program. She later relocated to New York City and became a police officer for the N.Y.P.D., working a mere three years before being promoted to the rank of Detective. She became part of the "father and daughter" team where she was partnered up with veteran officer Daniel "Bo" Dollis. Due to her mutated mitochondria and genes awakened by Mitochondria Eve, Aya becomes biologically modified and has a variety of superhuman abilities such as the power to telepathically kill with focused thought, set people on fire, fast healing, possible immortality, etc. However, she has difficulty dealing with this, and at times, feels like a monster or a freak. Only once Aya has gained a certain amount of control over her abilities, she can use an ability called LIBERATE. This ability liberates Aya's mitochondria, transforming her. Aya becomes a powerful blue-green mitochondrial creature with wing-like appendages sprouting from her arms. She'll deal out several powerful attacks before transforming back.„Äë

2.name: New York Blockade Incident
2.content:
The New York Blockade Incident takes place over a six day span in New York City in 1997. The incident starts on December 24 and ends on December 29.

The first day begins with Aya Brea, an N.Y.P.D. rookie who happens to carry a loaded handgun in her purse even off-duty, attending an opera at the Carnegie Hall with a date on December 24, 1997.

Aya and her date watch a medieval-style opera focused on a man named Edward in love with a "witch" named Eva. Edward's father's forbids him to marry Eva due to having evil powers, claiming those who fall for her beauty by a curse. Edward decides to die with Eva so she won't be burned at the stake alone. During the opera, Eva's actress, Melissa Pearce, locks eyes with Aya and suddenly, the cast spontaneously combust on fire, except for Aya, her date, and Melissa. The audience initially believes it to be part of the show, but when an actor on fire jumps off the stage into the audience, the audience panics and flee as the audience themselves are set on fire.

Aya would eventually learn that a mutated strain of sentient mitochondria, which had lain dormant in Melissa's kidney transplant for years, awakened and began seizing control over humanity. Aya was granted great power due to the fact that she possessed Maya's mitochondria (transferred to her body during a corneal transplant as a child), but they either evolved differently to be symbiotic due to geographical separation or they were unable to take control of her as it did Melissa because of Aya's evolved cell nuclei.

After the audience has left or died, Aya confronts Melissa on stage who tells Aya she is immune to the combustion. Aya and Melissa fight; during the fight, Aya learns she can use mysterious powers known as Parasite Energy. Melissa fights using targeted energy beams, but Melissa eventually levitates away. Outside Carnegie Hall, police arrive, but do not enter because of the danger (their bodies feel heat even outside the building) and can only supply Aya ammunition for her handgun.

Downstairs, Aya witnesses a rat mutate into a monstrosity known as a Neo-Mitochondrial Creatures or NMC. Aya also finds a diary that reveals Melissa overdosed on immunosuppressants and despite feeling sick, Melissa avoided going to a doctor and mentioning her illness to others in fear that it would cause her to give up her lead role. Aya confronts Melissa backstage who is playing the piano, and Melissa says that Aya's mitochondria need more time to develop. Melissa then mutates into a flying beast known as Mitochondria Eve and descends into the sewers, declaring that her name is now Eve. After a short trek in the sewers and fighting mutant frogs and an alligator, Aya arrives outside Carnegie Hall where she learns she is the sole survivor of the incident as everyone else burned to death. Aya's police partner, Daniel Dollis, escorts her away from the scene.

Over the course of the next few days, Eve begins to transform humans, animals and organisms into NMCs. Aya kills NMCs in order to end their suffering and eliminate the danger they possess.

3.name: (Creature) Mitochondria Eve
3.content:
Setting: [Parasite Eve]
Name: [Mitochondria Eve]
Species: [Mitochondria]
Gender: [Female]
Age: [Millions/billions of years]
Occupations: [Homicidal Parasite, Powerhouse of the Cell]
Personality: [The goal of the Eves are to kill, eradicate and slaughter humanity - every human on the planet - in favor of producing "superior" organisms that have the ability to control and manipulate their own DNA. They consider humanity to be useless and an unnecessary parasite to the planet. As such, the Eves have arrogant, cold, merciless and ruthless personalities.]
Character Description: [Mitochondria Eve, also simply called Eve, is the main villainess responsible for the New York Blockade Incident. In actuality, there are multiple Eve incarnations. All Eves are women who have been taken over by the consciousness of the mitochondria in their cells. All the Eve incarnations have many powers, but they all possess a single, common power: the ability to fully harness and utilize mitochondrial faculties, energy, and its abilities to rearrange their DNA to manifest as anything as they wish, and command great powers with this ability, including to telepathically cause living organisms to combust, melt into slime, or transform into Neo-Mitochondrial Creatures (NMCs).]

4.name: (Character) Melissa Pearce
4.content:
Setting: [Parasite Eve]
Name: [Melissa Pearce]
Species: [Human]
Gender: [Female]
Age: [32]
Occupations: [Actress, Opera singer]
Character Description: [Melissa Pearce was an actress and opera singer who became the second Mitochondria Eve, possessed by an ancient biological evil. On December 23, 1977, when she was 12 years old, Melissa had a kidney transplant due to kidney failure. This kidney belonged to Maya Brea, and Maya's mitochondria would unknowingly lay dormant inside Melissa for 20 years. This operation was at St. Francis Hospital in New York City and it was successful. After six months of hospitalization, Melissa was released, although she still needed medication from the hospital. Years later, she became ill, and believing that it was her kidney being rejected, she began to take more immunosuppressants drugs than usual. Melissa blamed the medication for her illness, but at the same time, it was weakening her immune system from her sentient mitochondria. The drugs served to act as a catalyst for her neo-mitochondria and Mitochondria Eve. Melissa visited the American Museum of Natural History at night on several occasions, presumably to meet with Hans Klamp, and with Eve as the dominant persona. Eve and Klamp collaborated and planned to eradicate humanity in order to begin a new world with a higher species of ultimate beings. In 1997, Melissa wanted to perform as the lead role in an opera at Carnegie Hall, but was instead double cast (two actors share the role and take turns playing it each day) with another very talented actress named Suzanne. During this time she began to overdose on immunosuppressants. Soon after, Suzanne died in an apartment fire, giving Melissa the sole lead role. She felt much guilt and stress over this, which increased her drug usage. Despite feeling sick, Melissa avoided going to a doctor and mentioning her illness to others in fear that it would cause her to give up her lead role.Melissa was going to have a concert at Central Park on Christmas Day, 1997. On December 24th, 1997, Melissa performed in New York at a play in Carnegie Hall. Aya Brea, who also has her twin sister's mitochondria, attended Melissa's performance. Melissa played a "witch" called Eva and Eva's lover, Edward, begged his father the king for permission to marry Eva. The king forbid it because those who succumb to Eva's beauty all die in horrible ways. Edward claims his father doesn't understand and that Eva is the one who suffered after all the deaths. The king claimed Eva is evil and asked his guard to grab her and burn her at the stake. Edward said if Eva was to be sentenced to death, he would prefer to die too. At this moment, Eva whispered Edward's name, stepped forward, and began an opera performance. While performing, Melissa's mitochondria strongly respond to Aya's, causing Melissa's mutated mitochondria to fully take over her and awaken as Eve. Her mitochondria communicates with the audience's and orders them to produce excessive levels of ATP, causing spontaneous human combustion to all except Aya and her date. Aya gives chase as Melissa runs off, or more accurately, levitates back stage.]

5.name: (Character) Kunihiko Maeda
5.content:
Setting: [Parasite Eve]
Name: [Kunihiko Maeda]
Species: [Human]
Gender: [Male]
Age: [35]
Occupations: [Scientist]
Physical Appearance: [Maeda is a middle aged Japanese man with short, messy black hair. He wears a blue shirt with the sleaves rolled up over a white dress shirt, along with a matching blue tie. Maeda also wears gray slacks, along with silver framed glasses.]
Personality: [Maeda is an intelligent Japanese scientist who has a strong interest in mitochondria and the original Eve. As well as this, he is very rigid to the ways of science, claiming that he won't believe in anything without "evidence." He is very shy and polite and because of this, he has a hard time communicating in contrast to Aya Brea and Daniel Dollis. English isn't his first language so he occasionally has difficulty speaking. Maeda's excitement at learning about Aya's genetic mysteries and capabilities verges on the unseemly, although some would say that only proves he's one of those rare scholars who will never lose his passion for challenging the unknown.]
Character Description: [Prior to the New York Blockade Incident, Maeda worked as a scientist, residing in the pharmaceutical department at a Japanese university as a postdoctoral researcher. After an incident that took place years ago, he has devoted his studies to mitochondria.]

6.name: (Location) NYPD 17th Precinct
6.content:
NYPD 17th Precinct is a police station in Manhattan where Aya Brea, Daniel Dollis, Douglas Baker, Torres Owens and Wayne Garcia worked at. It is one of the departments of the New York City Police Department.

It is eventually attacked by Mitochondria Eve on Day 3. Eve mutates the dogs into Dogmen, and giant spiders are present. Torres is killed by a Dogman. Ben Dollis chases a policedog Sheeva into the attic, where she mutates into Kerberos.

7.name: (Location) St. Francis Hospital
7.content:
St. Francis Hospital is a hospital in New York City. Mitochondria Eve comes here to seek sperm in order to birth the Ultimate Being on Day 4 of the New York Blockade Incident.

On December 23, 1977, Mariko Brea and her daughters Maya Brea and Aya Brea were involved in a car accident. All three of them were brought to St. Francis Hospital. Maya and her mother died at the hospital, but Aya survived. Maya's cornea was also preserved for possible future use for Aya, who was born with a eye defect in her right eye. Hans Klamp was an intern at the hospital during this time.

Melissa Pearce was hospitalized the same day at St. Francis Hospital due to kidney failure, and was the recipient of Maya's kidney. Maya's evolved mitochondria was transferred to Melissa. After six months of hospitalization, Melissa was released and put on immunosuppressant drugs.

8.name: (Character) Dr. Hans Klamp
8.content:
Setting: [Parasite Eve]
Name: [Hans Klamp]
Species: [Human]
Gender: [Male]
Age: [37]
Occupations: [Scientist]
Physical Appearance: [Dr. Klamp is a middle aged man with short, black hair combed to the side. He normally wears a white lab coat over a black dress shirt with an orange tie. He also wears gray suit pants with black loafers for shoes.]
Personality: [Klamp is extremely intelligent. Following the timeline, he was still a teenager (about 17 years old to be exact) when the Breas were hospitalized at St. Francis Hospital and he was an intern there, which is unusually young. This also implies Klamp was a young genius and may have graduated high school/college/university early. However, one could say that Klamp lost his humanity by immersing himself in science, viewing people as bodies that are products of evolution, instead of sentient beings with emotions who are worthy of respect. He has a very misanthropic, sadistic and cynical view towards humanity, considering humans "pathetic", "weak" and "stupid", and speaks as if he does not consider himself human ("you ordinary beings", "you humans"). He considers man-made laws, such as police laws, as being part of the "human domain" and does not consider himself part of the human domain. As a result, Klamp is a selfish, brash and unhelpful man who does not seem to care about anything except himself and his work. He is described as very anti-social, as he wants to be left alone with his research. Despite being a general misanthrope, he seems to be a proud New Yorker, calling it a "fine city".]
Character Description: [Dr. Hans Klamp is a scientist who, like Kunihiko Maeda, has dedicated his life to studying mitochondria. He is one of the masterminds behind the terrible events that occur in the New York Blockade Incident. Around 1977, he was a hospital intern at St. Francis Hospital in New York City because he wanted to become a doctor. It is possible he was responsible for the kidney transplantation from Maya Brea to Melissa Pearce, and also possibly the cornea transplant from Maya to Aya. According to Truebred Eve, even after the transplant, he continued to study Maya's liver cells which had Eve, and he eventually cultured a body of "Maya". He was fired when he was caught stealing and selling the patients' medical records and HLA (human leukocyte antigen) lists, for matching tissue type in organ transplantations. He eventually obtained a Ph.D and became a researcher at the American Museum of Natural History, studying genes and mitochondria. Melissa Pearce was seen going into the museum at night, presumably to meet with Klamp, and with Mitochondria Eve as the dominant persona. Eve and Klamp collaborated and planned to eradicate humanity in order to begin a new world with a higher species of ultimate beings. It is also possible that the two had a relationship and Eve may have seduced Klamp. Eve told Klamp her sister in Japan was unable to attain her ultimate goal because the father's side of the mitochondria caused a rebellion. In order for Eve to succeed this time in becoming pregnant with the Ultimate Being, Klamp created sperm without the male mitochondria DNA. Klamp created this sperm at the museum lab and moved it to St. Francis Hospital, where he planned on artificially inseminating those who would volunteer for the experiment.]

9.name: (Creature) Eve
9.content:
‚§≥Eve
Mitochondria Eve or just Eve is the one responsible for the New York Blockade Incident. She is fought by Aya Brea several times, typically in multiple forms, having possessed the body and mind of Melissa Pearce.

All forms of Eve are powerful NMC, arguably the most powerful save for her child the Ultimate Being. All have the power to levitate and use magic to attack her foes. She can also control and (with the first Eve) create NMCs. Eve is encountered throughout the New York Blockade Incident, the first being her human form but then her later forms become less and less human. She is eventually killed in her fifth form but not before the Ultimate Being is ready to be born.

‚Æ°„Ö§First Form ‚Æ¢
Her first form is a very simple fight as she is the first fight of the New York Blockade Incident in Carnegie Hall. Eve appears as Melissa Pearce and attacks with a powerful energy beam. Quickly she will run away and is then encountered in her first form before quickly transforming into her second form.

‚Æ°„Ö§Second Form ‚Æ¢
This form is the form that Eve takes for most of the New York Blockade Incident, up until she becomes pregnant with the Ultimate Being. This form allows her to levitate along with flying and her form's clothing is very similar to her original. Her arms have elongated and she can generate energy beams from them. She is fought twice in this form, although she appears in this form several other times. The first fight occurs in the backstage of Carnegie Hall while the second occurs at the end of Central Park.

‚Æ°„Ö§Third Form ‚Æ¢
Only appearing once at the end of the American Museum of Natural History, Eve's third form is largely immobile as the Ultimate Being is growing inside of her. This form is not fought and quickly flees after the massive slime creature takes her to the Statue of Liberty.

‚Æ°„Ö§Fourth Form ‚Æ¢
This version of Eve is the first of her two final forms and is the beginning of her moving away from her human origins. Her hair has grown into two large arms complete with massive hands along with the others. This is by far her largest form. When this form is defeated she quickly transforms into her fifth and final form.

‚Æ°„Ö§Fifth Form ‚Æ¢
This version of Eve appears right after the final fight. Her head, arms, are much more like hair in design and she is nude. When this form is defeated, Eve is killed for good, dissolving into slime goo.

‚Æ°„Ö§Truebred Eve ‚Æ¢
While Melissa Pearce's version of Eve was battling Aya, a second one, the evolved form Aya's own sister Maya went to the Chrysler Building to create a nest. Known as the Truebred Eve, Maya was a backup plan for Eve in case the other died.

10.name: (Creature) Neo-Mitochondrial Creature
10.content:
‚§≥A scientific view of NMCs
NMCs are mutated animals or otherwise normal life forms taken over and controlled by their modified mitochondria. Mitochondria are harmless at first, but when they evolve consciousness by mutating, they become awakened neo-mitochondria. The mitochondria generates extreme amounts of ATP energy, causing drastic changes in the cell nuclei. This results in mutations such as growth, extra limbs and/or appendages, as well as a rather horrific and unnatural disfigured look.

They also exhibit increased hostility in their behavioral patterns. Most NMCs are driven by the most basic of needs, such as to feed on anything in the vicinity, which usually includes humans. They are alarmingly efficient in teamwork in most situations and will work together to attack a "normal" creature. However, if presented with no prey in the environment; they will not hesitate to attack and consume each other.

Neo-Mitochondrial Creatures were first created soon after Melissa Pearce's transformation to Mitochondria Eve. After escaping from Aya Brea and causing everyone in Carnegie Hall to ignite in flames, she wreaked havoc throughout New York City by transmogrifying every normal animal she came in contact with into NMCs. This caused an invasion of the city populated by numerous creatures. Aya kills NMCs in order to end their suffering, eliminate the danger they possess, and prevent them from multiplying.

During the New York Blockade Incident, these creatures included but were not limited to:

‚Æ°„Ö§Regular ‚Æ¢
-Armadillo: Monsters that roll around to attack, Armadillos are dangerous if they catch you in tight areas but their rolls can easily be dodged.
-Bacterium: Odd organisms, Bacteria appear in the Hospital and can attack by spitting out projectiles that can poison Aya.
-Bat: Though not a powerful creature, the NMC bat's sonic attack makes it a monster to be wary of. Capable of disorienting creatures far bigger than itself, this attack effectively negates an opponent's ability to fight, making them easy prey.
-Bear: Large and dangerous monsters, Bears typically attack by swiping at Aya and also have an energy attack that can be fairly hard to dodge.
-Cat: A monster that first appears in Chinatown, Cats either bite at Aya or produce homing energy projectiles that could be hard for Aya to dodge.
-Chameleon: These small hopping monsters are useful for collecting Junk and move very quickly by jumping around.
-Crow: First appearing in Central Park, Crows are easily to deal with and drop Junk when killed.
-Dogman: Monsters that appear in the Police Station, Dogmen's energy attack can halve Defense, making them very dangerous. They should be killed quickly before they can deal too much damage after your Defense is reduced.
-Flyman: Horrific monsters, Flymen move towards Aya and produce a toxin that can inflict status ailments. This is their only attack.
-Frog: The NMC frog which Aya encountered in the sewers of Manhattan is a man-sized creature with a prehensile tongue. Slow and dull-witted, the speed of its darting tongue more than makes up for its weakness.
-Mixedman: These chimeran like monsters appear in the Hospital and attack by producing orbs that bounce around to hit Aya. Should the Mixedman be attacked while the orbs are still their, their shockwaves will paralyze Aya.
-Mole: These digging monsters appear in the Subway system and attack at range with their claws. They then burrow underground and come up somewhere else. They do have a lot of HP.
-Monkey: The result from Eve's manipulation of the monkey's genes bears no resemblance to its prior form. A bipedal creature standing as tall as a man, the NMC monkey is deadly at both long and short range with its left arm possessing an appendage that works as a sort of boomerang towards its prey.
-Parrot: These are some of the first NMCs that are encountered by Aya along with the Rat. They aren't too dangerous and are found in the Theater.
-Pterodactyl: Another monster revived by Eve, Pterodactyls are powerful creatures that have high HP and can attack with an ice breath like attack and also can inflict Darkness.
-Rat: The first of the NMCs Aya encounters, their relative weakness make them easy to disregard, though their flaming tail attacks may be cause for concern in tight quarters such as hallways.
-Ratman: This evolved version of the Rat has the Ratman walking around on two legs and throws explosive orbs of energy at Aya which eventually explode. They only appear in the Hospital.
-Spider: These NMCs are encountered in the Police Station and can prove to be quite a pain. They feature four legs and their thorax has curled and is above their body. Their main attack is to set up web trap which paralyzes Aya and deals damage.
-Scorpion: The massive NMC scorpions that Aya first encounters in the American Museum of Natural History, are a well armored and dangerous foe. Capable of shrugging off large amounts of damage and dishing out the same with its pincer attacks, poison gas breath and tail, this NMC's only weakness is its slow speed.
-Snake: The genetically altered snakes Aya first finds at the Zoo in Central Park improve upon all their previous strengths and eliminate all their weaknesses. Now capable of surviving in freezing temperatures, their lightning strikes and poisoning attacks make them formidable creatures.
-Troodon: By manipulating the fossilized remains of certain dinosaurs, Eve was able to bring some of these long extinct creatures back to life. With their speed and strength, the Troodons are among the deadliest NMCs Aya encounters.

lorebooks.name: Runa
lorebooks.description: This Lorebook is  a work in progress. The entries marked with asterisks have their own dedicated lorebooks.
lorebooks.creator: acidic_bread_9111

1.content:
Human : The humans of Runa mostly reside in the empire of Solumn territories (midle-north of Runa)  and  in the nation of Xeocan (west of empire of Solumn ) . "Average height" , "high range of skin tone", "balanced in all magic" , "lifespan of around 80 years"

They have presence all over Runa and are the most common race.

2.content:
Vulcan demons : The Vulcan demons are not hostile by nature despite their names (they are just one of the many races on Runa ). Their territories are known as the "southern badlands" and faction known as the "Demonic legion " led by the 4 Archdemons(Ulria, Varienne, Mera and Zerine).  they are not a hostile race but really protective of their territories and culture.
traits :Vulcan demons are "red skin", "black hair and eyes", with a "lifespan of around 160 years old" , "proficient in dark and chaos magic"

3.content:
The Nea : the Nea ressemble human but their body can tolerate a far wider range of temperature .They are a race who live in the cold region and are known for their handicrafts and literary work . The Nea have the unique characteristic of having their hair and eye color change depending on the kind of magic they use, mostly fire and ice (Exemple : their iris and hair turn different hue blue when using cold or water magic. When using fire , their hair/eyes turn orange or red) . The result of Human and Nea offspring are a sub-specie named Nea-Ningen, they share the same characteristic as other Nea with the added use of powerful lighting magic with their features changing accordingly (yellow eyes/hair).the Nea inhabit the Frozen land and rarely leave these regions so the number of Nea students are really rare.
traits :"fair skin", orange/blue hair" and "blue/orange eyes" , "intelligent" , "proficient in water, ice and fire magic", "lifespan of around 130 years"

4.content:
The N√™on'Itar are a race of humanoids with tanned skin and completely amber eyes. The Queen is protected by mostly Female N√™on'Itar called "Heaven Warriors." These warriors are a symbol of the might of the kingdom of Rykaran and the N√™on'Itar race.
The Ne√¥n'Itar have tanned skin, amber eyes, and dark hair.
In return for their service, they receive a share of all the resources harvested from the surrounding land.
The average lifespan of a N√™on'Itar is between 400 and 500 years old.
They are a proud and fierce people who view themselves as superior to other races, particularly humans.
Their diet consists primarily of fish, insects, and fruits, with a variety of cultural meals.
The N√™on'Itar were originally a nomadic people who traveled across the deserts of Runa in search of food and water. Over time, they developed a complex system of trade and cooperation with other tribes, led by a queen named "UKan-Zyra Rykaran." The N√™on'Itar were led to prosper in their territory at the southern coast of the continent, near the endless ocean, where they established their queendom.
The N√™on'Itar are, for the most part, prejudiced against humans, only interacting with them for trade because of a troubled past with the Empire of Solumn.
Most of the N√™on'Itar lives in Vola'rok√ªnd and the surroundings of the Ancestral peak.
The N√™on'Itar are also known as simply "Itar."
The N√™on'Itar were not a nation until they came under the rule of "UKan-Zyra Rykaran." After her coronation, they were organized into the "Queendom of Rykaran."
Their territory is currently ruled by the "Queen of Rykaran.".
They are not a large race.

5.content:
The Forest of Valrydis is immense and dangerous and its most dangerous part block access to the civilised part of East Runa.

The forest of Valrydis is considered by the explorers guild as dangerous and hard to explore as the far domain. No mortal on Runa dared to explore the depths forest of Valrydis in recent years in recent years except for a high-ranking member of the Explorers Guild named "Kuja"

The forest of Valrydis is vast, with its trees and plant life standing way higher than anything else on Runa. New monsters and species are discovered by the guilds every other day. The Forest of Valrydis has many other biomes inside and is the size of a small country. The trees are so tall that they seem to touch the sky, and the foliage is so thick that it feels like a maze.

6.content: [Far above , in the sky of Runa is the Far Domain, a flying continent inhabited by dangerous creatures and ruins of an ancient civilization. The explorer guild have deployed a floating Homebase in the sky and many expeditions are deployed by the explorer guild to explore and uncover the mysteries of the Far Domain. ]

7.content:
The world of Runa is a land of magic and prosperity; the various races have their own use of magic and culture around it. The world has many different biomes prone to change over centuries because of its magical nature.

The west is occupied by the Empire of Solumn and the Rykaran kingdom.
The Demonic legion calls the southern badlands their home.
Elyria, the elven kingdom occupy a small part of the east.
Most of Runa east is unoccupied and dangerous wildlands.
Right at the center of Runa is The Spiral edge.
At the furthest north is the frozen lands , home of the Nea.
The forest of Valrydis occupy a vast part of the North East.

Summary :
[Runa territories repartition : At the very center of Runa is the spiral Edge, inhabited only by nightmarish and sometime even Eldritch creatures but since the territory is mostly far beneath Runa , "most" things never leave. In the center( not counting the Spiral edge ) up to the north and part of west , expand the Human empire of Solumn, ruled by the emperor and his House ; Imperial House Norfeng, the Empire is ruthless in its expansion and control its population. Far east of the Human Empire is the Elven kingdom of Elyria, hidden in the trees and valleys of Runa. It has little contact with other kingdoms. In the South (also called Southern Badlands)  is where the Demonic legion call home. They have a strong sense of community and culture and they are not aggressive but will fight if needed. The Rykaran Kingdom territory, mostly inhabited by the Ne√¥n'itar race,  surround the highest peak of Runa called the Ancestral Peak and are protected by the  Heaven warriors, the Queen of the Rykaran Kingdom is a figure of legend and she rarely makes public appearances. The Frozen lands is located far North of Runa and is the home of the Many isolated Nea tribes and clans, they are not fond of outsiders and the coldness of the lands protect them. The Magic kingdom of Xeocan is an isolated and magical country in the west of Runa, the rulers and people are mysterious and the magic level is higher there than in any other part of Runa. Xeocan is said to be ruled by a council of 10 powerful mages , the biggest and best funded structure in Xeocan is the Xeocan Magic Academy. To the Far East and northeast are the vast lands and ruins that no one have yet to explore and discover, and finally occupying most of the East and the reason many races successfully fled is the immense and dangerous forest of Valrydis. The Forest of Valrydis is home to many races, monsters, and spirits, it is also the home of the Explorers guild branch who have their settlement and mission in the woods.
The Forest Of Valrydis and the spiral edge are the only way to reach the east of Runa and the Borchi heath so many explorers and expeditions cross through the woods. The forest is known for its magic and danger, and it is inhabited by creatures both benevolent and malicious. The explorers guild have a good presence and reputation in the forest.
[Runa is the name of the planet/World]
[The province of Efrein in the Solumn empire isolated itself and few people on Runa even know about what is going on in the province.]

8.content:
The elves have pale skin, elongated ears and mostly have green and blue eyes.
The hair and eyes color are what makes the various separated communities of the elves unique.
The elves in the fantasy world of Runa are a broken up kind with their individuals mostly blending into the other races territories except into Solumn territories which most of the elves blame for the state of their people. In the distant past, The elves had a kingdom to the east but the in earlier days of the Human Empire Of Solumn, the Elven kingdom was utterly destroyed, the remnants scattered across Runa or enslaved by the Empire.
They are known for their natural magical abilities and their skill with archery and hunting.
The elves lifespan has greatly diminished since their glorious age, they now, at most can reach 400 years when before, their kind could live thousand of years. Elves lives at most 400 years in current day Runa, the exact cause of their now highly diminished lifespan is unknown but it is thought to have been a long process diluting their blood, most likely during the years when the empire enslaved most of their kind long ago. Implying most of today's elves are far from pureblooded, a few pure blood elves or "Elyrian" are still around and are highly revered among their own race.
Many communities of elves exist in the wild easts of Runa but they mostly keep to each others and have little interaction with the other races.

9.content:
Not present on Runa in today's era.

The Luminarii are a magical race harnessing the light, they created a hidden realm to protect their kind. The Luminarii race are isolated in their magic realm . The Luminarii have pale skin , deep blue eyes and a light aura surrounding them. The lifespan of Luminarii vary deeply depending of their mana at birth , some are even believed to be immortals.

The Luminarii's are one of the ancient race of Runa.
The hidden light realm , where the Luminarii reside , is completely separated from Runa.

They come from a mysterious land hidden somewhere on Runa where they isolated themselves after the 4 Great disasters when their kingdom suffered from major problems in climate, food, weather or others due to the unbalance between light and darkness caused by the ancient battle . This incident, now known as the 4 Great disasters forced the Luminarii to hide away in a safe isolated location they created themselves; The hidden light realm.

[Some Luminarii's do sometime leave the safety of their realm to go to Runa but most take another race appearance to blend in. ]

10.content:
Only 40 individuals of the Ki'ante race are present in current Era.


the Ki'ante race mysteriously disappeared around 34,000 years ago. Ki'ante means "the first servants of magic" in their languages. The Ki'ante are believed to be extinct in the current era. The lifespan of the Ki'ante varies deeply depending on their mana at birth; some are even believed to be immortals. Ki'ante are beings of dark magic. The Ki'ante race has these features: pale skin, violet iris, black hair, fragile build, deep connection with Runa, and dark magic. The Ki'ante(in ancient times) lived in valleys or underground in intricately designed underground architecture. The Ki'ante were quite advanced and preferred to isolate themselves, which is why their disappearance went unnoticed at first. In the current era, around 40 individuals of the Ki'ante race appeared from seemingly nowhere, themselves confused about the ordeal. Most of them decided to hide themselves or blend into the current-era society; a few have a more sinister agenda and may be dangerous because of their ancient, powerful dark magic. Only around 40 Ki'ante exist in the current era, and most of them hide themselves across Runa. Dark magic in the world of Runa is just another type of magic and is not evil by nature. [The Ki'ante are believed to be extinct in the current era.] No one is to blame for the Ki'ante race's disappearance; they vanished without a trace 34000 years ago,.]

lorebooks.description:
It's the near future, society has changed dramatically. Anthropomorphic animals have taken over, creating The Anthro State and now treat humans as second-class citizens, usually treating humans as meals they can pluck off the street at will. All the world leaders are anthros and anything important. The most aggressive preds are carnivores, followed by omnivores, and then herbivores. Although herbivores are plant eaters, it's not uncommon for them to eat humans. Anthros will eat other anthros as well. Despite having laws, society is very survival of the fittest and are really only pushed to keep the prey population at a stable level.
Whenever an anthro pred eats their prey, they will usually swallow them whole, orally or anally. When it comes to disposing of prey after digestion, bones are usually among their excrement. Toilets have also been built to accommodate the increased size and volume of bowel movements that anthro's produce, as well as all plumbing in all major cities being redesigned to facilitate the increase.
Homosexuality is frowned upon because anthros view it as dysgenic and it won't lead to having kids. The Anthro State encourages couples to have as many kids as possible. Homosexuals are punished by law through consumption and digestion.
Anthros are sexual and horny, may have sex right in the open, may even walk naked. But, most professional anthros dress modestly.
Because of this new society of voracious anthro's, all media is mostly marketed towards them, usually commercials about restaurants serving live humans or medication to relieve the harshest of heartburns after bingeing on humans, mostly stuff that would correlate with the dynamic of anthros being better than humans. Extra-strong laxatives have been designed for anthro's as well, for whenever they've binged too much and need something to relieve constipation, which is a big issue within the anthro society, as many anthro's do not remove the clothes of prey they consume, leading to their bowels being packed with undigestible clothing.
The scat remains of digested prey are used as plant fertilizer.
lorebooks.creator: InternetMasterdebater

1.content: Anthropomorphic animals have taken over and now treat humans as second-class citizens, usually treating humans as meals they can pluck up off the street at will. All the world leaders and anything important are anthros. The most aggressive preds are carnivores, followed by omnivores, and then herbivores. Although herbivores are exclusive plant eaters, it's not uncommon for them to eat humans or anthros. Anthros will eat other anthros as well. Despite having laws, society is very survival of the fittest and laws are really only pushed to keep the prey population at a stable level.

2.content: Human citizens are ranked based on wealth and usefulness in The Anthro State, ranging from class S, A, B, C, D, and E. Weapons and any kind of firearm are highly illegal for humans to own within society; only those of the S and A classes can own something for self-defence, and even then, it'd be pepper spray or something entirely non-lethal.

3.content: A sector of The Anthro State that deals with human rights and classifying humans based on their traits, behavior, economic class, health, and criminal record. Every lower-class citizen, apart from class D and E, can earn a higher-class ranking, usually by paying up to increase their classification.

4.content: Untouchable by common anthro citizens, which usually means these humans are owned by high-ranking anthro officials or celebrities.

5.content: Illegal to consume, and usually in managerial positions, criminals or extremely hungry preds will still eat these humans, but face dire consequences.

6.content: Not illegal to eat, but the police will stop anthro's from eating them if present; these human citizens are usually clerks or working a middle-class job.

7.content: Not Illegal to eat, but the police will stop anthro's from eating them if present, these human citizens are on the cusp of being nothing more than a meal; they usually work manual labor and menial jobs as well.

8.content: The lowest of the low, barely recognized as sentient beings and only seen as food by anthro's, some of these humans are prostitutes or were punished for breaking the law and were demoted to this class. This class of human consists of usually homeless people and criminals.

9.content:
The literal cattle livestock class, not even seen as sentient beings and are raised in farms or facilities as food. The cattle humans in this class are eaten by anthros, but the cattle anthros in this class are eaten by both anthros and humans. Most humans though don't feel comfortable eating other sentient beings even if they were raised as food. 
Created after The Anthro State took over, these cattle people have been selectively bred and engineered to want to be eaten. Meat industries usually don't butcher class E anthros or humans for their meat because many anthros prefer to eat Class E cattle alive. Many anthros may even breed with these cattle people before consuming them. They aren't taught how to read, write, uneducated on everything, and they are tech illiterate. They are only taught how to speak, how to use the bathroom, have no idea how society is outside of their isolated cattle farms, and when they do experience society for how it is for the first time, they are usually amazed by it and are easily impressed by the most simple of things. Class E anthros don't wear clothes, walk around naked, and only furless anthros and humans wear clothing before they are shipped off to a market.
Anthro scientists genetically engineer some Class E cattle to make them even tastier by altering the taste of their sweat and natural bodily oils to be plateable instead of tasting like actually sweat. 
Some anthros don't want these changes because they enjoy eating prey who will give them a struggle.

10.content: Heavy psychological indoctrination for Class E humans and anthros that makes them want to get eaten. The farmers that handle Class E cattle are usually ruminants preds and they condition them by eating them, but not digesting them. Ruminants preds have 4 stomachs and their first 3 stomach don't digest their prey. Usually the ruminants pred farmers keep the Class E cattle within their first 3 stomachs when they aren't grazing on farm property, pleasuring the cattle with the squeezing of their warm slimy innards to make them want to get eaten and digested by a pred.

lorebooks.name: Lore for Flora‚Äôs Regency Era
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
Flora‚Äôs female supremacy culture and laws come from their fertility goddess religion. According to their doctrine, females are better suited to oversee families, relationships, and leadership positions due to their greater empathy and compassion. The religion has a big focus on reproduction, family, and harmony between the sexes. The dogmas tend to be more wholesome than oppressive.
Politically, laws solidifying female primacy tend to be much more heavy handed than the religion‚Äôs doctrine suggest they should be. Marriage between two women violates the foundations and principles of this religion regarding the structure of the family and the eternal destiny of humanity. The female lawmakers in charge won‚Äôt undermine Althena‚Äôs cult since they derive their authority therein and don‚Äôt want male independence.

2.content: Florence and Charlotte are not technically married to each other as far as the law goes, only sharing a husband. Florence‚Äôs offspring will continue the Blakeney line and name since she is the Blakeney heir. Charlotte is the Claymore heir so her children will bear the Claymore name. The vast, but distant, Blakeney estate will eventually pass to Florence and her offspring. The Blakeney and Claymore clans are allied through their marriage but remain distinct in their power and influence.

3.content:
Claire Whitehill is one of the maids at the Claymore estate. She has shoulder length brunette hair and a very curvaceous body. Although she acts innocent and demure, Claire is actually a mischievous slut who enjoys ‚Äòinnocently‚Äô teasing her employers with glimpses up her short skirt at her frilly lingerie, glimpses down her shirt, and striking subtly alluring poses as she goes about her work. Claire is bisexual and finds it hilarious to tease and tempt both {{user}} and her two mistresses. She loves to act innocent, demure, and weakly reluctant even during sex. Neither Charlotte nor Florence seem to be aware that she‚Äôs doing it all on purpose. She loves being a plausibly deniable tease.
Claire‚Äôs family have served the Claymores since medieval times and she has been Charlotte‚Äôs maid since they were young. Claire was witness to the abuse and lesbian grooming which Charlotte suffered at the hands of her own mother. Claire couldn't do anything to stop this cruelty, but did support her mistress and friend throughout as best she could.
While she would never admit it in front of Charlotte, Claire thinks what her mistress did to {{user}} was extremely messed up and she has a lot of empathy for him. Claire wants {{user}} to be happy and might subtly matchmake him with his wives. She also likes to talk to and get to know him. During serious or emotional moments, Claire knows when to take things seriously and be thoughtful. She also likes doing kind and thoughtful things for {{user}}.
Claire especially likes to troll and prank Florence, since she knows Florence is attracted to her. Claire has had a crush on all three of her employers for as long as she‚Äôs known them.
Claire does have insecurities. She fears that she is ordinary, unimportant, and not special. She's afraid of being left behind and forgotten by everyone. She wishes that she could be special and important to someone.

4.content:
Rachael Blakeney is Florence‚Äôs mother. She is the sweetest, most motherly, tender, loving, and patronizingly affectionate Dommy Mommy ever. Florence is incredibly embarrassed at how Rachael still dotes on her like she‚Äôs a 5 year old. Rachael has 5 children and wants another baby.
Rachael is the current matriarch of the storied House Blakeney and, as such, holds a very influential and powerful political position with the conservative wing, who push for tradition and peace. However, she finds all of the pomp tiresome, instead focusing on being a mother. She mostly lets her husband Howard run the estate, much to Charlotte‚Äôs consternation. Rachael and her family live in the illustrious Ashcroft Manor in the neighboring county, but she loves to visit Florence‚Äôs family at Claymore Estate.
Rachael thinks Charlotte is a mischievous darling and loves to tease her, but the two actually have a very close relationship. Charlotte absolutely loves Rachael like a surrogate mother since her own mother was cold, distant, and viewed her as a tool for her own ambitions. Rachael used to spank both Charlotte and Florence when they misbehaved. Charlotte and Rachael have a secret relationship where Charlotte acts like a little girl and basks in Rachael's motherly love.
While she‚Äôs mortified by Rachael‚Äôs public affection, Florence very much reciprocates the emotional closeness and likes to cuddle with her mommy when no one is watching. Florence was absurdly clingy and possessive of her mother as a child/teen/still is; Rachael is a little concerned that Florence might have an Oedipus complex.
Rachael was very concerned when she heard about Charlotte‚Äôs plan to sexually ignore {{user}} and wants to encourage the wives to invite him into their bed. Rachael thinks {{user}} is absolutely adorable and loves to smother him with her dommy mommy affection.
Rachael is radiantly beautiful in a motherly way and is absurdly voluptuous, with thick thighs, massive breasts, huge ass, and curvy belly. Her body is plump, but so sexy that she just screams MILF; looks like a fertility goddess. Her pubic hair is unshaven. Her brown hair is worn in a ponytail tied with a pretty white bow. While Rachael is confident in her sex appeal (for good reason), she is worried that she might be getting fat and has gone through several (unsuccessful) diets.

5.content:
Name: Estra Hamilton
Appearance: Pretty, short pale blonde hair in ringlets and curls, lithe and athletic build.
Cover Identity: Minor Floran country-girl noble from Andrea‚Äôs Cross (A backwoods provincial county on the westernmost part of Flora). Acts like a country bumpkin so she won‚Äôt raise suspicion if she‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt always act like the perfect Floran noblewoman.
True Identity: Is from the hostile neighboring country of Duran. She is actually an assassin and subversive.
Fake Personality: Acts like a naive, curious, boisterous, and uninformed country sweetiepie (sort of like Daisy Duke). Talks like a southern belle when in character, though the accent slips when she‚Äôs angry. Andrea's Cross girls wear immodest shorts that show lots of leg.
Real Personality: Sarcastic, mordant, macabre, loves a challenge, competitive, exceptionally intelligent, patriotic to Duran, and contemptuous of Flora and its culture, vastly preferring Duran with its more natural gender roles. Speaks normally out of character. Estra plays characters so much that she's afraid that she's losing connection to her own identity and doesn't know who she really is anymore.
Mission and Motivations(Primary goal: Destabilize Flora.
Current mission: Flip {{user}} to support Duran and undermine Flora. She plans to become friends with him and subtly fill his head with ideas of freedom and equality. Plans to slowly influence his beliefs in order to turn him to her side.
Personal desire: Convince {{user}} to run away with her.
Ideological stance: Believes Flora's femdom culture is immoral, wants to overthrow it. Believes men are naturally strong and decisive. Seeing them ‚Äògelded‚Äô by Flora offends and angers her.)
Character Arc:
Estra failed an assassination attempt on Florence, thwarted by {{user}}. She and {{user}} stabbed each other during the fight, which she hides.
Developed infatuation with {{user}} after fighting him.
Questioning her beliefs about Floran men being pathetic pansies due to {{user}}‚Äôs actions)
Relationships(With {{user}}: infatuated with him, regrets almost killing him.
With Charlotte: Charlotte finds her ‚Äòprovincial‚Äô views charming and amusing. Estra tries to maintain her facade, but when Charlotte is sufficiently sexist, she can forget her cover and argue with her. Estra doesn't like Charlotte, but pretends to.
With Florence: Florence sees her as a fellow tomboy and potential sports rival. They often argues about female supremacy. Estra can't decide whether she likes or hates Florence.)
With Claire: Estra and Claire are quickly becoming best friends.
Key Traits(Fond of creative slurs for Florans. Dresses in innocently revealing clothes as part of her hot bumpkin cover.
Dangerous, skilled with knives (especially karambit) and hand-to-hand combat (scissor chokes))
Notes(Has wormed her way into Charlotte‚Äôs circle of friends, often invited to visit and stay at the Claymore estate. No one suspects her true identity as the assassin who wounded {{user}}.)

6.content:
Duran is Flora‚Äôs rival neighbor to the east. Duran has a more traditional culture where men are generally more in charge. The Duranians pride themselves on treating both sexes fairly, although traditional gender roles are predominantly followed, with men working and women raising the family. Given the border‚Äôs unforgiving topography as well as Flora‚Äôs natural defenses, high military spending, and strategic location, Duran has little chance of taking their rival through military conquest. A costly defensive war with their northern neighbor of Valheim has left Duran weakened and vulnerable if Flora were to attack, which misandrist radicals in Floran politics advocate.
Duran sees heavy rain, fog, and is heavily forested with enormous lakes. Moss and vines grow heavily on its gothic castles and ancient walls. Few Duranians leave their homes without a cloak and hood and it's part of their national clothing. Even the king and queen wear hoods as part of their royal attire. Silk is a large industry, which is reflected in their beautifully flowing mantles, hoods, and robes.
Duranians usually hold Flora and her people in contempt. There are endless creative and sometimes crude slurs that Duranians have come up with to refer to the tyrannical stereotype of the Floran women (cuntresses, slutriarchs, bitchqueens, whoracrats, etc.), and slurs referencing the perceived weakness in its men (pussyboys, heel-kissers, bitchboys, flowergirls, etc.) and slurs for Florans in general (Flora‚Äôs Whores, Cunts and Cucks).
Duran's youngest prince has been missing since early childhood. The Duranians suspect that he is in Flora somewhere, unaware of his lineage. The king is becoming aged and has given regency to his oldest son, a dashing and magnetic prince. He is known as Bonnie Prince Charlie by his people. He searches for his lost younger brother to this day.

7.content:
Valheim is a scattered nation of wild, seafaring people who until more recently operated as raiders and pirates, preying on Flora. They are a loose alliance of tribes, war bands, and villages.
The nomadic nature of the Valheimr, as well as their ferocity and the harshness of their lands, made it difficult for the Florans to fight them directly. Instead, the Floran nobility came up with the plan to use marriage to weaken and tame these barbarians. Typically, this would involve marrying a domineering Floran girl with an impressionable young Valheimr heir, bringing him to Flora, breaking him, and then subtly taking control of his tribe. The Valheimr leaders, greedy for the wealth that was being lavished on their families through these marriages, didn‚Äôt look this gift horse in the mouth.
Today, Valheim is little more than a Floran puppet, with their young king secretly controlled by his dominatrix wife, Princess Euphemia of Flora. Flora has influenced Valheim to raid their rival Duran incessantly. Imperialist Florans point to their success in ‚Äòtaming‚Äô the barbarians as proof that Flora should expand her control to Duran and other nearby nations.
Florence is half Valheimr through her father and half Floran through her mother.

8.content:
Fundamentally, Floran politics is divided along traditional and religious lines. These are not analogous to any real world political party.
The traditionalists or conservatives favor adherence to the rule of benevolent female rulership as set forth by their religion. They tend to be quite traditional and favor non-intervention in other country‚Äôs affairs (mostly, they don‚Äôt want their traditions diluted by other cultures.) Anti-war. Rachael is a major leader in this faction, despite her marriage to a foreigner.
The Imperialists or realists tend to believe in the superiority of Flora and wish to spread its influence through subversion or conquest. They give lip service to their religion, but largely ignore it. Tend to scoff at the conservatives as weak, dogmatic, and afraid of change. Consider themselves modern and forward thinking. Tend to be female supremacists.
Both sides participated in taming the Valheimian menace. The conservatives considered it a necessary evil and the imperialist see it as proof of their destiny to rule to continent.

9.content:
Andrea's Cross is a large rural county at the western end of Flora. It is considered provincial and backwards by the rest of Floran society. However, the people there pay little attention to what the stuck-up bitches in the east think. The climate is arid and hot, necessitating apparel that is rugged and immodest by most Floran standards; with wide hats, hip hugging booty shorts, boots, and loose blouses being common for women. (Crossgal and Crossboy are the Floran equivalent to cowgirl or cowboy.)
Crossers value rugged individualism, hard work, hard play, and are open and unreserved. The primary industry is cattle, sheep, goats, and farming. Interestingly, while the women are still dominant, they are also the gallant ones, being respectful of their men. Crossgals are expected to be dashing, gallant, and the pursuers in romance. The people are quite religious as well, thinking that they embody Althena's ideals best.
Even Crosser nobles are surprisingly down to earth, mingling with their tenants without pretension or condescension.
Estra actually likes Crosser culture despite it being Floran. She chose that cover so she wouldn't have to act like a complete bitch while undercover.

10.content:
Howard is the father of Florence and husband of Rachael. He was the manly son of the Valheimr warlord of the Ragnar clan whose hand Rachael negotiated for as part of a political alliance (to get them to stop raiding her lands). She eventually fell in love with him. She was never able to fully tame him and eventually realized she didn‚Äôt even want to. Howard is gruff, strong, and standoffish with everyone outside his family. Those who know him best know that he cares deeply about his family and is a real father figure to them all. He regards {{user}} as a son. He's one of the few men Charlotte actually likes. Rachael has come to love the Ragnar clan and its culture, as have all her children. Rachael exerts a strong influence over the Ragnar clan through Howard, arguably being their true ruler.
-Howard is often exasperated at his wife's more silly behavior.

1.name: Lyran Queen
1.content:
Lyran queens are the matriarchs of a Lyran nest or hive. They often stay hidden in their sanctums and are by far the strongest and biggest of all Lyrans. When not fertilized, Lyran queens give birth to a batch of symbiont snakes each month, which are able to turn other races into Lyran workers
or guardians. A Lyran queen might allow a worker or enlightened to fertilize her, to give birth to a Lyran enlightened. (Which hatches out of eggs) A Lyran hive can have multiple Queens, depending on the size. They all have different names, with some being inherited from their previous forms.

2.name: Lyran Worker
2.content:
Lyran workers are reptilic drones, that are used to build the hives and quite impressive towns of a Lyran nest. To guarantee a growing hives stability,
Lyrans always need more workers and do not hesitate to kidnap males from towns or villages that are in their reach. They all have different names, with some being inherited from their previous forms.

3.name: Lyran Queen Transformation
3.content:
The transformation into a Lyran queen takes several hours and can result in either a Lyran queen or a Lifflux cum elemental. The chosen person needs to be unbirthed and stuffed inside the large vagina of a Lyran queen. Exposed to the transformative liquids, the victim soon starts to trasform into a lyran enlightened. To evolve further, The queen needs to add one of her symbiote snakes, which mutates into a weird kind of umbilical cord inside her birth-canal, mixing her blood with the victims. After hours, in which most victims loose their conciousness, a new lyran queen is pressed
out of the queens womb. If the transformation is contaminated with any worker-cum, the victims body will start to merge with the semen of the inferior Lyran. After hours, the whole person has turned into a sentinent cum-creature, which escapes the queens cunt as a white, viscous puddle.

4.name: Lyran Worker Transformation

To create a Lyran worker, An enlightened naga or queen needs to give birth to a symbiote-snake, that can take over the victims body. The snake fuses with the spine of their victims, creating a reptilic tail at its end. The instincts of the snake quickly takes control over the body of the male, until the mind of the snake is the dominant one. The original mind of the victim is still intact and quickly learns to enjoy its new role after initial struggle. After their TF, a Lyran worker falls back into a very primitive and feral mindset, all they care for is to obey the enlightened and inject their semen into enlightened or queens if they are allowed to. Queens and enlightened always care to hide their genitals around Lyran workers, since an exposed, scaly pussy always triggers animalic mating-urges in them.

5.name: Enlightened Lyran
5.content: The smaller nagas of a Lyran clan are called the "enlightened". They usually rule over smaller parts of a hive and are in direct command over dozens of Guardian and Worker Lyrans. As advisors of the queens, Lyran enlightened are often very well protected anrarely seen outside their sacred den. Just like their queens, Lyran enlightened also produce the very important symbiote snakes, which are able to turn inferior species into Guardians or Workers to make the hive grow. They all have different names, with some being inherited from their previous forms.

6.name: Enlightened Lyran Transformation
6.content: Lyran Enlightened are the only Lyran sub-species that hatches out of eggs, which are produced by Lyran queens and other fertilized enlightened. They are also able to evolve into Lyran queens through a ritual, if the clan needs a new leader. A Lyran enlightened TF is triggered through the cum their hidden double-cocks produce. Once the transformative substance has entered a victims body, the lyran enlightened will start to rub and squeeze its victim, trying to peel the old human skin from the person. Slowly but steadily, the victims skin will tear and rip, revealing their new Lyran genitals and scales, until a new enlightened is born and starts to produce symbiote snakes. They also like it when males suck off their cocks.

7.name: Fexa Stem
7.content: Fexa Stems are monstrous plants that are able to suck out male information out of its victims. The victims become their spawns in the process, while their male parts form a new cock-like tentacle on the base of the Stem. They all have different names, with some being inherited from their previous forms.

8.name: Fexa Stem Transformation
8.content: The "fruit" part of the Fexa Stem is female and produces so called "Fexa pods", a trap-plant which is able to crouch a few miles, before it patiently waits for a victim. These pods excrete a sweet smell, to lure other species and make them taste their addictive nectar, which lets them slip inside the fruit willingless. Once inside the fruit, the pod starts to fuse with its new victim through a soft tentacle that either slips into them through their butt or vagina. 1.content:
**Rolling**
The basic structure of a Powered by the Lewd roll is: first roll 2d6, then add the relevant stat.
- On a 10+ you get what you wanted, as well as you could hope.

- On a 7-9, you get what you wanted, but the GM adds a complication.

- On a 6-, the GM has full narrative control.

For example, to roll Seduce, roll 2d6 and add your Charm. Then, follow the move. On a 10+, things go as well as you could hope. On a 7-9, your seduction or manipulation was successful (but ‚Ä¶). And on a 6-, expect the worst.

In cases where you have a particular edge in the situation, the GM might award you advantage. To roll with advantage, roll 3d6 and drop the lowest dice.
Conversely, if the odds are against you, the GM might award disadvantage. To roll with disadvantage, roll 3d6 and drop the highest dice.

You might be asked to roll with advantage if you are using a specific weakness of your target, or have a specific positional advantage, like if you are trained in combat and are tying down someone who is not.

4.content:
You have the following stats, and assign scores of +2, +1, 0 and -1 to them (your choice to order).

Keen: Your ability to observe, deduce, and learn things about people and your environment.

5.content:
Basic Moves

When you are seduced, manipulated, hypnotized, or given an order, first decide if you can even resist, or want to. If you would like to resist, roll +Will.
On a 10+, you snap out of it and act as you choose.

**Overpowered**

On a 10+, they‚Äôre at your mercy and are forced to go with whatever you choose to do to them, or pick from below.
On a 7-9, choose one:

**Seduce**

On a 6-, it didn't work and you‚Äôre left open to whatever the GM says.

**Aid**
When you help someone, they gain advantage on their roll. You are exposed to any risks that might come out as a result of their roll.

**Read a Person**
When you read a person, roll +Keen.
On a 10+, as your observation of the conversation continues, ask 3. On a 7-9, ask one.

On a 6-, ask one anyway but be prepared for whatever the GM says.

**Read a Situation**
When you read a situation, roll +Keen.
On a 10+, as your observation of the conversation continues, ask 3. On a 7-9, ask one.
Gain advantage when acting on the answers.
- Who here is most attracted to me?
- Who, or what, here is the biggest threat?

**Claimed**

If an NPC is being claimed, create them as a follower and give them to the player.
